content.p: The following programmes are organised and delivered by us. However, there are a number of opportunities offered through schools and departments and the Researcher Academy that you should also explore. Paid internships in the East Midlands and beyond for Nottingham students and graduates Get great consultancy experience with local organisations Get involved in a project to promote sustainability at Nottingham Find out how to organise a work experience placement as part of your current course Be inspired, build knowledge and gain experience to help you get into digital marketing Search part-time job vacancies on campus and in the local area to fit around your studies Check out the opportunities offered through your school or department, or talk to one of our advisers. telephone: +44 (0) 115 951 3680 fax: +44 (0) 115 951 3679 email: careers-team@nottingham.ac.uk
